Checking can include conformance to the agreed configuration, compatibility of interfaces, and the presence of mandatory information items. The Project Assessment and Control process can be used in accordance with the integration strategy to plan and conduct technical reviews of the integrated software system elements, e.g., a test readiness review to help ensure the integrated element or system with its affiliated data and information items is ready for qualification testing. c) Manage results
